item.description: Software Engineer - Zalando SE (Mar 2015 – Present) / Berlin, Germany Building Zalando's Kubernetes Infrastructure on AWS Working on Zalando Payments AWS infrastructure becoming PCI-DSS certified Implement a DDos Solution to mitigate cloud-based traffic (AWS/GCP) Developing a Akamai Open Source Library System Engineer - Zalando SE (Jun 2014 – Mar 2015) / Berlin, Germany Maintain Zalando's data centers Release of my first open source project, providing an API to automate service endpoints (DNS/IP) Working on a deployment framework using Mesos/Kubernetes System Engineer - Zalando AG (Jul 2013 - Jun 2014) / Berlin, Germany
